'''<code>info_update</code>''' and '''<code>info_update2</code>''' are debugging or placeholder blocks exclusive to {{BE}}. They previously generated in place of blocks with invalid IDs.

== Obtaining ==
These blocks cannot be obtained via {{cmd|give}} or {{cmd|setblock}}, and as such can only be obtained through inventory editors or [[add-on]]s.

=== Breaking ===
No tools can accelerate the breaking process of {{cd|info_update}} and {{cd|info_update2}}.
{{breaking row|info_update, info_update2|horizontal=1}}
{{cd|info_update}} and {{cd|info_update2}} drop themselves when they're destroyed.
